name: Zone 2 Cardio

dosage.notes: Heart rate 60-70% max. Can hold conversation. Walking, cycling, swimming. Peter Attia protocol.

keyFindings: Strongest predictor of longevity: VO2max/cardiorespiratory fitness
Reduces all-cause mortality more than any supplement
